alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 1:35AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bayfield, northwestern Iron and Ashland Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 134 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cornucopia, to near Benoit, to near Namekagon, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sanborn around 140 AM CDT. Marengo and Bayfield Peninsula Sea Caves around 145 AM CDT. Ashland, Sand Bay and Sand Island around 150 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include York Island, Odanah, Red Cliff, Mellen, Gurney and Devils Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
